text: LGBT people can be pro-gun and anti-abortion, two historically Right Wing policies. But being LGBT would put them solidly to the left of historically Right Wing politics. A real conundrum for the GOP. Do they welcome them or shun them?

author: catherinecc
text:
I suspect neurodivergent people will be next up, but it'll likely be 20-30 years.

Though cynically speaking, we'll probably see them regress further and openly target racial minorities, but there will be some kind of different spin on it from the past. More social anti-miscegenation, less legal. More using economics instead of openly discriminatory laws.

And likely "dem city folk" will be an effective dogwhistle.
